WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I would like an alternative syntax for addressing a cell, (column number, row number) instead of present (column letter . row number)
Â 
In a program it's natural to address cell one in a sheet as cell(1,1). But cell one is addressed A1, which means programs have to translate column number to a letter, in this case 1->A.

Comments.Message:
There is a method in the Cell class which handles these conversions.

If you really think it's more useful to implement this directly, please let me know.

I've created the following new methods:

PHPExcel_Worksheet->setCellValueByColumnAndRowPHPExcel_Worksheet->getCellByColumnAndRowPHPExcel_Worksheet->getColumnDimensionByColumnPHPExcel_Worksheet->getStyleByColumnAndRowPHPExcel_Worksheet->setBreakByColumnAndRow

These are now present in the SVN repository, and will be released in 1.2.0.
Without trying, it looks like what I want. I just want to avoid the translation, syntax do not matter.Thank you very much!
